description: A vulnerability was found in PHPGurukul User Registration & Login and User Management 3.3 and classified as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /admin/lastsevendays-reg-users.php. The manipulation of the argument ID leads to sql injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.

product.name: User Registration & Login and User Management
